# Henno AI

> Henno AI is an AI automation consulting firm based in Cape Town,
> South Africa that helps small businesses (1-50 employees) automate
> repetitive work using artificial intelligence tools and workflows.
> Founded by Henno Fourie, an AI automation specialist who builds
> and deploys AI systems for clients.

## Services
- [AI Automation Consulting](https://henno.ai/): Full-service AI automation consulting for small businesses including workflow audits, tool selection, and implementation
- [Free Automation Audit](https://henno.ai/#book): 30-minute consultation to identify automation opportunities in your business

## Guides
- [AI Automation for Real Estate Agencies](https://henno.ai/ai-automation-real-estate-agencies.html): How real estate agencies can automate repetitive tasks with AI
- [Hiring vs Automating with AI](https://henno.ai/hiring-vs-automating-ai-small-business.html): Cost comparison for small businesses deciding between hiring and AI automation
